entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43390
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43389
  • Binding redirects are not generated for transitive packages with version incremented with central package management transitive pinning #43388

Closed

  • vmr-pull-updates uses inline scripts instead of calling external scripts #43392
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43112
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/6.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43104
  • Could you please delete this issue? Thank you." #43387
  • Add a EventPipe test for a native AOT library #34839
    9.0.1xx
  • SDK 9.0 rc2 carries microsoft.net.sdk.aspire 9.0.0-preview4 which causes aspire workloads and templates to disappear. #43301
  • project.assets.json is not being updated when restoring #9476
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Use NuGetAudit property to condition NuGet source auditing #43397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies (#40725) #43393
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Hot Reload: Handle file deletions correctly #43368
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Search version in set #43096
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix processing non-public classes and generic types in AssemblyScheduler.cs #43377
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix TestResultMessagesSerializer #43376
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Allow binlog in dotnet test #43286
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #43365
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 dotnet/runtime and dotnet/aspnetcore codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.100-rc.1.24452.1 September 2024 Updates #43363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • [VMR] Add support for join point vertical job in vmr-build.yml #43288
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Publish prebuilt reports for each repo #43336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: also try Basic auth when username is '<token>'. #43354
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
